title: Google | L4 | Bangalore
content:
Education: B.tech
Years of Experience: 13+
Prior Experience: SSE
Date of the Offer:  2024
Company: Google
Title/Level: L4
Salary: 36L
Signing Bonus: 3LPA
Stock bonus: $80K stock grant vested over 4 years
Bonus: Performance-based bonus up to 15% of salary every year
Total comp for first year (Salary + joining Bonus + performance bonus + Stock): 69LPA
Other details: Downleveled to L4 and given 5lac more that current ctc . HR told my feedback was super good in all round still this lowball offer .Also did they layoff recently ?
Please guide
salaryTotal: For First Year (salary + Joining Bonus + Performance Bonus + Stock): 69lpa
